name: Mr. RED (2D)
description:
One night Mr. Red found out he lost his memories and he only remembers that his friends are kept in jail and now he must find them along with his lost memories!

Game Length :- 10-15mins~

Install instructions
  1. Download .rar archive.
  2. Extract using WinRAR, 7-Zip or another software equivalent.
  3. Run Mr.RED.exe to start the game.
